plot: An anthology series that centers on different characters and locations, including a haunted house, an insane asylum and a witch coven.
title: American Horror Story

plot: Spoiled Billionaire playboy Oliver Queen, is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.
title: Arrow

plot: To provide for his family's future after he is diagnosed with lung cancer, a chemistry genius turned high school teacher teams up with an ex-student to cook and sell the world's purest crystal meth.
title: Breaking Bad

plot: Series introduces Dracula as he arrives in London, posing as an American entrepreneur who maintains...
title: Dracula

plot: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros.
title: Game Of Thrones

plot: Ted searches for the woman of his dreams in New York City with the help of his four best friends.
title: How I Met Your Mother

plot: A woman with a troubled past is drawn to a New England town where fairy tales are to be believed.
title: Once Upon a Time

plot: In Victorian England, the young and beautiful Alice tells a tale of a strange new land that exists on the other side of a rabbit hole.
title: Once Upon a Time in Wonderland

plot: The story of Piper Chapman (Taylor Schilling), a woman in her thirties who is sentenced to 15 months in prison after she is convicted of a decade old crime of transporting money for her drug dealing girlfriend (Laura Prepon).
title: Orange Is the New Black

plot: Police officer Rick Grimes leads a group of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.
title: The Walking Dead

plot: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.
title: The Big Bang Theory

plot: A high school girl is torn between two vampire brothers.
title: The Vampire Diaries

plot: When Marine Nicolas Brody is hailed as a hero after he returns home from eight years of captivity in Iraq, intelligence officer Carrie Mathison is the only one who suspects that he may have been "turned".
title: Homeland

plot: Three different, but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.
title: Modern Family

plot: After doctors inform him that an eye affliction will require risky surgery, monologist Spadling Gray recounts his various pursuits for alternative medicine to avoid the doctor's scalpel.
title: Gray's Anatomy

plot: The further adventures of the time traveling alien adventurer and his companions.
title: Doctor Who

plot: Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, whilst unraveling the mystery of the murder of their best friend.
title: Pretty Little Liars

plot: A man in his early 30s struggles to find a balance in his life between being a new dad and his involvement in a motorcycle club.
title: Sons of Anarchy

plot: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as "hunters" fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.
title: Supernatural

plot: The missions of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.
title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.

plot: Former government agent Raymond "Red" Reddington (James Spader) has eluded capture for decades. But...
title: The Blacklist

plot: Series will focus on The Original family of vampires from Vampire Diaries.
title: The Originals

plot: Chronicles the life and times of Nucky Thompson, the undisputed ruler of Atlantic City, who was equal parts politician and gangster.
title: Boardwalk Empire

plot: Five strangers are connected by the curse that has plagued Ravenswood for generations.
title: Ravenswood

plot: A group of revolutionaries confronts an authoritarian regime 15 years after an instantaneous global shutdown of all electrical devices known as the Blackout.
title: Revolution

plot: Chronicles the rise to power of Mary Queen of Scots (Kane) when she arrives in France as a 15-year-old...
title: Reign

plot: The daughter of a framed executive makes it her mission to infiltrate upper Hamptons society and exact revenge on the people who set her father up.
title: Revenge

plot: Drama about the pioneers of the science of human sexuality whose research touched off the sexual revolution.
title: Masters of Sex

plot: Centers on the adventures of a mother and her two adult daughters, both of whom unknowingly are their family's next generation of witches...
title: Witches of East End

plot: Ichabod Crane is resurrected and pulled two and a half centuries through time to unravel a mystery that dates all the way back to the founding fathers.
title: Sleepy Hollow

plot: The lives of two detectives, Rust Cohle and Martin Hart, become entangled during a 17-year hunt for a serial killer in Louisiana.
title: True Detective

plot: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.
title: Sherlock

plot: A Miami police forensics expert moonlights as a serial killer of criminals who he believes have escaped justice.
title: Dexter

plot: A forensic anthropologist and a cocky FBI agent build a team to investigate death causes. And quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.
title: Bones

plot: A famous "psychic" outs himself as a fake and starts working as a consultant for the California Bureau of Investigation so he can find "Red John," the madman who killed his wife and daughter.
title: The Mentalist

plot: A high-school Spanish teacher becomes the director of the school's Glee club, hoping to restore it to its former glory.
title: Glee

plot: The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service
title: NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service

plot: Beginning in the years leading up to World War I, the drama centers on the Crawley family and their servants.
title: Downton Abbey

plot: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle gets permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.
title: Castle

plot: Carrie Bradshaw is in her junior year of high school in the early 1980s. She asks her first questions about love, sex, friendship and family while navigating the worlds of high school and Manhattan.
title: The Carrie Diaries

plot: Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.
title: True Blood

plot: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, Mike Ross, a brilliant college-dropout, finds himself a job working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.
title: Suits

plot: A White House Communications Director leaves to start her own crisis management firm only to discover she hasn't left the past behind.
title: Scandal

plot: After a bad break-up, Jess, an offbeat young woman, moves into an apartment loft with three single men. Although they find her behavior very unusual, the men support her - most of the time.
title: New Girl

plot: An invisible and mysterious force field descends upon a small fictional town in the United States, trapping residents inside, cut off from the rest of civilization. The trapped townsfolk must discover the secrets and purpose of the "dome" and its origins, while coming to learn more than they ever knew about each other.
title: Under the Dome

plot: An invisible and mysterious force field descends upon a small fictional town in the United States, trapping residents inside, cut off from the rest of civilization. The trapped townsfolk must discover the secrets and purpose of the "dome" and its origins, while coming to learn more than they ever knew about each other.
title: Under the Dome

plot: The cases of the BAU an elite group of profilers that analyze the nation's most dangerous criminal minds in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.
title: Criminal Minds

plot: A white collar criminal agrees to help the FBI catch other white collar criminals using his expertise as an art and securities thief, counterfeiter and racketeer.
title: White Collar

plot: The story of several young people from around the world who represent the next stage in human evolution...
title: The Tomorrow People
